short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Encodes and Decodes Base 64 Plus encodes Hex and URI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows a user quick access to encode and decode base64 encoded data.  As a plus,  You can also URL and Hex encode.  This is a free app and always will be.  No ads.
